title: News24.com | Lockdown: 148 arrested in Gauteng for gatherings, liquor trading and refusing to stay home
description: Gauteng police have arrested 148 people and issued warnings to 25 others for failing to adhere to lockdown regulations in place since the start of the 21-day lockdown in the country.
content:
Gauteng police have arrested 148 people and issued warnings to 25 others for failing to adhere to lockdown regulations in place since the start of the 21-day lockdown in the country on Friday.
Provincial police commissioner Lieutenant General Elias Mawela sa… [+3393 chars]
